an7.70:1.1: Atha kho ayasmato sariputtassa rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
an7.70:1.2: “kim nu kho, bhikkhu, sakkatva garum katva upanissaya viharanto akusalam pajaheyya, kusalam bhaveyya”ti?
an7.70:1.4: “sattharam kho, bhikkhu, sakkatva garum katva upanissaya viharanto akusalam pajaheyya, kusalam bhaveyya.
an7.70:1.10: patisantharam kho, bhikkhu sakkatva garum katva upanissaya viharanto akusalam pajaheyya, kusalam bhaveyya”ti.
an7.70:2.2: “ime kho me dhamma parisuddha pariyodata, yannunaham ime dhamme gantva bhagavato aroceyyam.
an7.70:2.3: Evam me ime dhamma parisuddha ceva bhavissanti parisuddhasankhatatara ca.
an7.70:2.4: Seyyathapi nama puriso suvannanikkham adhigaccheyya parisuddham pariyodatam.
an7.70:2.6: ‘ayam kho me suvannanikkho parisuddho pariyodato, yannunaham imam suvannanikkham gantva kammaranam dasseyyam.
an7.70:2.7: Evam me ayam suvannanikkho sakammaragato parisuddho ceva bhavissati parisuddhasankhatataro ca.
an7.70:2.8: Evamevam me ime dhamma parisuddha pariyodata, yannunaham ime dhamme gantva bhagavato aroceyyam.
an7.70:2.9: Evam me ime dhamma parisuddha ceva bhavissanti parisuddhasankhatatara ca’”ti.
an7.70:3.1: Atha kho ayasma sariputto sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
an7.70:4.1: “Idha mayham, bhante, rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
an7.70:4.2: ‘kim nu kho bhikkhu sakkatva garum katva upanissaya viharanto akusalam pajaheyya, kusalam bhaveyya’ti?
an7.70:4.3: Atha kho tassa mayham, bhante, etadahosi:
an7.70:4.4: ‘sattharam kho bhikkhu sakkatva garum katva upanissaya viharanto akusalam pajaheyya, kusalam bhaveyya.
an7.70:4.8: Atha kho tassa mayham, bhante, etadahosi:
an7.70:4.9: ‘ime kho me dhamma parisuddha pariyodata, yannunaham ime dhamme gantva bhagavato aroceyyam.
an7.70:4.10: Evam me ime dhamma parisuddha ceva bhavissanti parisuddhasankhatatara ca.
an7.70:4.11: Seyyathapi nama puriso suvannanikkham adhigaccheyya parisuddham pariyodatam.
an7.70:4.13: ayam kho me suvannanikkho parisuddho pariyodato, yannunaham imam suvannanikkham gantva kammaranam dasseyyam.
an7.70:4.14: Evam me ayam suvannanikkho sakammaragato parisuddho ceva bhavissati parisuddhasankhatataro ca.
an7.70:4.15: Evamevam me ime dhamma parisuddha pariyodata, yannunaham ime dhamme gantva bhagavato aroceyyam.
an7.70:4.16: Evam me ime dhamma parisuddha ceva bhavissanti parisuddhasankhatatara ca’”ti.
an7.70:5.2: Sattharam kho, sariputta, bhikkhu sakkatva garum katva upanissaya viharanto akusalam pajaheyya, kusalam bhaveyya.
an7.70:5.3: Dhammam kho, sariputta, bhikkhu sakkatva garum katva upanissaya viharanto akusalam pajaheyya, kusalam bhaveyya.
an7.70:5.8: patisantharam kho, sariputta, bhikkhu sakkatva garum katva upanissaya viharanto akusalam pajaheyya, kusalam bhaveyya”ti.
an7.70:6.1: Evam vutte, ayasma sariputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
an7.70:6.2: “imassa kho aham, bhante, bhagavata sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attham ajanami.
an7.70:6.3: So vata, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agaravo dhamme sagaravo bhavissatiti netam thanam vijjati.
an7.70:6.4: Yo so, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agaravo dhammepi so agaravo.
an7.70:7.1: So vata, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agaravo dhamme agaravo sanghe sagaravo bhavissatiti netam thanam vijjati.
an7.70:7.2: Yo so, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agaravo dhamme agaravo sanghepi so agaravo.
an7.70:8.1: So vata, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agaravo dhamme agaravo sanghe agaravo sikkhaya sagaravo bhavissatiti netam thanam vijjati.
an7.70:8.2: Yo so, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agaravo dhamme agaravo sanghe agaravo sikkhayapi so agaravo.
an7.70:9.1: So vata, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agaravo dhamme agaravo sanghe agaravo sikkhaya agaravo samadhismim sagaravo bhavissatiti netam thanam vijjati.
an7.70:9.2: Yo so, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agaravo dhamme agaravo sanghe agaravo sikkhaya agaravo samadhismimpi so agaravo.
an7.70:10.1: So vata, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agaravo dhamme agaravo sanghe agaravo sikkhaya agaravo samadhismim agaravo appamade sagaravo bhavissatiti netam thanam vijjati.
an7.70:10.2: Yo so, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agaravo dhamme agaravo sanghe agaravo sikkhaya agaravo samadhismim agaravo appamadepi so agaravo.
an7.70:11.1: So vata, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agaravo dhamme agaravo sanghe agaravo sikkhaya agaravo samadhismim agaravo appamade agaravo patisanthare sagaravo bhavissatiti netam thanam vijjati.
an7.70:11.2: Yo so, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agaravo …pe… appamade agaravo patisantharepi so agaravo.
an7.70:12.1: So vata, bhante, bhikkhu satthari sagaravo dhamme agaravo bhavissatiti netam thanam vijjati. Yo so, bhante, bhikkhu satthari sagaravo dhammepi so sagaravo …pe….
an7.70:13.1: So vata, bhante, bhikkhu satthari sagaravo …pe… appamade sagaravo patisanthare agaravo bhavissatiti netam thanam vijjati.
an7.70:13.2: Yo so, bhante, bhikkhu satthari sagaravo …pe… appamade sagaravo patisantharepi so sagaravo.
an7.70:14.1: So vata, bhante, bhikkhu satthari sagaravo dhammepi sagaravo bhavissatiti thanametam vijjati. Yo so, bhante, bhikkhu satthari sagaravo dhammepi so sagaravo …pe….
an7.70:15.1: So vata, bhante, bhikkhu satthari sagaravo …pe… appamade sagaravo patisantharepi sagaravo bhavissatiti thanametam vijjati.
an7.70:15.2: Yo so, bhante, bhikkhu satthari sagaravo dhamme sagaravo sanghe sagaravo sikkhaya sagaravo samadhismim sagaravo appamade sagaravo patisantharepi so sagaravoti.
an7.70:16.1: Imassa kho aham, bhante, bhagavata sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attham ajanami”ti.
an7.70:17.2: Sadhu kho tvam, sariputta, imassa maya sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attham ajanasi.
an7.70:17.3: So vata, sariputta, bhikkhu satthari agaravo dhamme sagaravo bhavissatiti netam thanam vijjati …pe…
an7.70:17.4: yo so, sariputta, bhikkhu satthari agaravo dhamme agaravo sanghe agaravo sikkhaya agaravo samadhismim agaravo appamadepi so agaravo.

an7.70:18.2: Yo so, sariputta, bhikkhu satthari agaravo dhamme agaravo sanghe agaravo sikkhaya agaravo samadhismim agaravo appamade agaravo patisantharepi so agaravo.
an7.70:19.1: So vata, sariputta, bhikkhu satthari sagaravo dhamme agaravo bhavissatiti netam thanam vijjati …pe… yo so, sariputta, bhikkhu satthari sagaravo dhammepi so sagaravo …pe….
an7.70:20.1: So vata, sariputta, bhikkhu satthari sagaravo dhamme sagaravo …pe… appamade sagaravo patisanthare agaravo bhavissatiti netam thanam vijjati.
an7.70:20.2: Yo so, sariputta, bhikkhu satthari sagaravo …pe… appamade sagaravo patisantharepi so sagaravo.
an7.70:21.1: So vata, sariputta, bhikkhu satthari sagaravo dhammepi sagaravo bhavissatiti thanametam vijjati. Yo so, sariputta, bhikkhu satthari sagaravo dhammepi so sagaravo …pe….
an7.70:22.1: So vata, sariputta, bhikkhu satthari sagaravo …pe… appamade sagaravo patisantharepi so sagaravo bhavissatiti thanametam vijjati.
an7.70:22.2: Yo so, sariputta, bhikkhu satthari sagaravo …pe… appamade sagaravo patisantharepi so sagaravoti.
an7.70:23.1: Imassa kho, sariputta, maya sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attho datthabbo”ti.
